topics.body:
Dear diary: Obama's a fucking idiot.

Short explanation is that he wants all operating systems to have backdoors for the government.  The problem is that Unix is open source and accounts for 60% of all the servers in the world so in order the internet to comply Unix would have to open source the backdoor.  Imagine putting a backdoor into a operating system, now imagine showing everyone on the entire fucking internet how to get into any computer that uses it.

To put it blunt Obama's a fucking idiot because that would give anyone with access to google unrestricted access to the vast majority of servers.  To make it even more blunt imagine showing the world how to use the backdoors for our nuclear arsenal and showing the world how to have unrestricted access to them.

Tl:dr; Obama's a fucking idiot.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54bed4fc63687264c6ad0200#post_54bed4fc63687264c6ad0200
No!

This is a kickstarter trailer, Kickstarters are on the internet. 

Kickstarter is a site people recently started using. Its where people can donate to your ideas. 

So for starters the trailer is meant to get people's attention so they can help this game (If they like it) Get funded to be released! 

And so the developers can make the game.

Trust me trailer would NEVER go on tv.
